column5: Is there a web site that I can purchase my Ontario fishing lisense before my July trip to Nungesser lake. Any reports from there yet, how is water high/low Thank you

Phone this number to order your licence by mail ahead of time: 1-800-667-1940 Prices for non-residents: Full Sport Licence: $65.77 Consevation Licence: $40.26 8-day Sport Licence: $42.22 8-day Conservation Licence: $24.55 "Non-residents under 18 years of age may fish without a licence if accompanied by a adult who has a recreational fishing licence. Any fish caught are part of the catch and possession limit of the adult who holds the licence. As another option, non-residents under 18 years may purchase a licence and any fish caught apply to the catch and possession limits of that licence." Source: http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business...02_165323.html NWO Fishing Bum
